value.title: Capture feedback and monitoring data to continuously improve your software
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure release pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications.

topItems.title: Recommend and design system feedback mechanisms
topItems.excerpt: Learn how surveys and application analytics create a feedback loop that helps you understand the voice of the customer.

topItems.title: Route system feedback to development teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: Cloud administration basics
value.excerpt: The first learning path in a course on Cloud Administration from Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the basics of the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types of services, in preparation for real-world cloud practice on Azure.

topItems.title: Foundations of cloud computing for administrators
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the cloud, including the history, building blocks, and types on your way to becoming a Cloud Administrator.

topItems.title: Provision and manage cloud services
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about the different types of resources available on the cloud and the technology behind how they work.

topItems.title: Secure your cloud resources with access control
topItems.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Learn about digital identities and how they can be managed and synchronized within an organization.

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI in government
value.excerpt: It's imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in Government. Discover guidelines to set up principles and a governance model in your organization.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI in government
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for governments, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the public sector.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Identify principles and practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: It's imperative to reflect on the implications of AI in business. Discover Microsoft guidelines to set up principles and a governance model in your enterprise.

topItems.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

topItems.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
topItems.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for organizations, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the enterprise.

topItems.title: Discuss practices for responsible AI at Microsoft
topItems.excerpt: Discover how to translate your organization’s ethical principles into actionable guidance and tools for engineering teams and how AI can improve lives worldwide

value.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).
